import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Carousel, Container, Row, Col, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import Items from "../../items.json"; import "./index.css"; const Shop = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return
Welcome to Samaria Jewelry
From the Holy Land
{/* */} {/* */}
{Items.map(item => { return ( handleShow()} onMouseOut={() => handleClose()}> ) })}
Test
} export default Shop;
